plot outline: The Mr. Dependable, Aaditya Shah, who loves his tuxedo as much as his piano, in his seemingly perfect world, is not even aware that he is looking for his imperfect companion. The adventure sports lover and early morning hater, RJ Antara, is the most loved voice of the city. This mad hatter has no idea about the insane adventure coming her way. The kitli-ni-cha lover and Mr. jo-baka genius, Sagar has fallen in love 23 times or at least he thinks so. But, this time it's true love, and he's not ready for it. So, what happens when the imperfect, the mad and the genius come together?
title: Love Ni Bhavai
plot: A popular radio personality with an aversion to love meets two men with differing views on romance.

The Mr. Dependable, Aaditya Shah, who loves his tuxedo as much as his piano, in his seemingly perfect world, is not even aware that he is looking for his imperfect companion. The adventure sports lover and early morning hater, RJ Antara, is the most loved voice of the city. This mad hatter has no idea about the insane adventure coming her way. The kitli-ni-cha lover and Mr. jo-baka genius, Sagar has fallen in love 23 times or at least he thinks so. But, this time it's true love, and he's not ready for it. So, what happens when the imperfect, the mad and the genius come together?
